> I wonder, since they drew him as a shadow/silhouette
> if they actually showed him in the episode of the 
> anime.

Yes, they did. It starts by showing other Shinsengumi
fighting (mostly in silhouette, but their trademark
blue-and-white uniform can be clearly seen). Then it
shows the mostly the same scenes from the manga, but
in color and motion of course. :) Both Saito and
Chujiro are completely drawn in, so you can see their
faces. I wish I had the equipment to make a
screenshot, but I do not. :/

Tatsuko
